text: incredible I mean I just wonderful to
see people you know coming out and just
singing it and being joyous about his
life and I haltom true weight by dancing
and singing michael jackson died at the
age of 50 while preparing for a series
of comeback concerts in london the King
of Pop was known as one of the most
gifted and popular entertainers of all
time his 1982 album Thriller sold more
than a hundred million copies around the
world and defined 80s pop it is the best
selling album in history Michael Jackson
was a musical prodigy by 11 he was
singing with his brothers in the Jackson
they're smashes included ABC and I'll be
there and they were one of Motown's most
beloved groups
and then in the 1970s Michael went solo
he had a huge hit with 1979's off the
wall don't stop till you get enough was
one of three number one singles from the
album and then in nineteen eighty two
came the iconic thriller produced by
Quincy Jones it took hold of the top ten
for nearly two years and spawned seven
top-10 hits including Billie Jean's told
me what to do thriller 18 Grammys and
set a benchmark for success Michael
could never match
the thriller video which was more like a
short film was a sensation when it
premiered on mtv michael continued to
triumph in the 90s with the album
dangerous and an acclaimed performance
at the super bowl in 1993 but his
personal life became much thorny or over
the decade and he became regular tabloid
fodder for his plastic surgery his brief
marriage to Lisa Marie Presley and the
extravagant Neverland Ranch by the end
of the 90s he was borrowing hundreds of
millions of dollars to maintain a lavish
and increasingly reclusive lifestyle
soon after he divorced his second wife
Debbie Rowe and took custody of his two
children but his parenting skills were
often criticized in 2003 he was
photographed dangling his new baby over
a balcony in Germany and later called it
a terrible mistake but most damaging to
his reputation were charges that he
sexually molested a boy at Neverland
Ranch Jackson denied all charges and
after a lengthy trial that could have
resulted in a 20-year sentence he was
fully acquitted in 2005 Jackson left the
United States to recover from the trial
but a couple years later plans for a
comeback were in the works thriller was
reissued on its 25th anniversary and
Jackson announced that he would perform
a staggering 50 shows in London starting
in July all 50 concerts sold out in a
matter of hours Michael Jackson will be
remembered as a quintessential superstar
and a dazzling singer and dancer and
despite all the problems of the past two
decades his fans never gave up on him
